column1: Episode 1 - Winter Is Coming
Credits
White Walker in the North
Bran comes of age, climbs walls, gets pushed from window
Arya comes of age- wants to fight, Jon gives her Needle, beats Joffrey in a fight,
Sansa coming of age - betrothes to Joffrey, has a moment with Sandor Clegane
Catelyn hates Jon Snow
Stark Executs Will
Starks find direwolves that murdered a stag
Jon Arryn, hand of the king is dead

Cersei& Jaime murder Jon Arryn to cover up their secret. Jaime pushed Bran for seeing them. Joffrey is not the rightful air. Gendry is his oldest bastard. Jon Arryn's squire is murdered in the tournament
Robert Baratheon goes to Winterfell, returns, puts hit out on Daenarys. Sleeps with whores.
The King asks Ned to  be his hand, he accepts. Then he quits is rehired, summons Tywin,declares Stannis as true king, buys the city watch from Baelish, is crossed, and is murdered.
Joffrey coming of age, betrothed to Sansa, attacked butcher's boy, and (unrightful) heir to the throne, takes the throne and kills Ned Stark
King is in love with Lyanna (dead)
Robert and Ned grew up together
Robert killed Rhaegar Targaryen and Jaime Lannister killed Aerys Targaryen
Daenarys coming of age, weds Khal Drogo, get Dragon eggs, pregnant, dragons hatch
Viserys Targaryen wants to use his army to take over Westeros, is horrible to Daenarys
Uncle Benjin arrives from the wall
Jon Snow takes the Black, aska about his mom, is a virgin, becomes Commander Mormont's steward, recieves Long Claw
Ned and Jaime Lannister spar
lysa Arryn fled to Eyrie with Robert Arryn
Ned's father was the hand of the king and died in King's Landing with his brother
Jor=rah Mormont is introduced to Daenarys and pledges fielty. Fled Westeros b/c he sold poacher.

Tyrion goes to the wall with Jon, they bond, on his way back he is arrested by Catelyn, is pardoned and meets up with wildlings and then his father in battle where he meets Shae. Made Temp Hand of the King
